comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Prince Ōyama Iwao, OM (大山 巌?, 12 November 1842 – 10 December 1916) was a Japanese field marshal, and one of the founders of the Imperial Japanese Army. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Iwao_Oyama

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: thanks for the background information.  We will update the record.

comment._content:
